LinearRegression.h File Reference

This file offers a class for creating a regression model that will approximate data pairs (x,y) by finding a linear mapping for them. More...

#include "Array/Array2D.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Classes

class  LinearRegression

Detailed Description

This file offers a class for creating a regression model that will approximate data pairs (x,y) by finding a linear mapping for them.
